main_intro: To work with us as a Translator, Editor or Proofreader, we need to know more about you and your skillset. Please fill in the form below and submit you application. Thank you!
submitted_info: Your application was submitted. We will contact you shortly.
please_select_different_language: Please select a different language for the target language
title: Skillset form

mobile_phone_number.title: Whatsapp
mobile_phone_number.helper: This allows us to contact you directly for urgent translation projects

email.title: Email
email.helper: This allows us to email you about translation jobs that we may have available in your language pair

word_count.title: How many words can you translate daily?
word_count.helper: This helps us understand your capacity when assigning you jobs.

proz_profile_url.title: Profile URL
proz_profile_url.helper: This helps us evaluate your experience and and prior feedback.

terms_accepted.title: Partner Terms of Engagement
terms_accepted.rightLabel: I accept the Partner Terms of Engagement

country.helper: This helps us comply with our clients' requirements and any local privacy legislations.
